items.title: In The Clear iOS App
items.description: iOS App that allows the user to determine what weather conditions they should expect to experience during their travels.
items.techStack: Built using Swift; the backend was built using AWS Lambda and NodeJS. The Podfiles used include Google Maps, Google Places, Firebase (Authentication), Realm, AlamoFire, and SwiftyJSON.

items.title: In The Clear Web
items.description: A web app that gives the user all the functionality of the In The Clear iOS app.
items.techStack: Built using ReactJS, Redux, Firebase (Authentication), Bootstrap, .Net Core, AWS Lambda, MSSQL, and Docker. Like the iOS app, Google Maps and Google Places were used.

items.title: In The Clear Home Page
items.description: The front facing webpage for In The Clear. It includes a list of features, updates, pricing, and privacy policy.
items.techStack: Built using GatsbyJS, ReactJS, TailwindsCSS, and GraphQL

items.title: Path Finding Visualizer
items.description: An iOS and Android application that allows pathfinding algorithms to be visualized in action. Current algorithms include Dijkstra's (unidirectional and bidirectional), A* (unidirectional and bidirectional), Breadth-First Search, and Depth-first Search.
items.techStack: Built using React Native, Typescript, Expo, and Native Base.

items.title: Personal Website
items.description: A website that shows what I've done both professionally and in my free time.
items.techStack: Built using ReactJS, NextJS, TailwindCSS, Sass, NodeJS, and Netlify.
